formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Notion Materials on Workplace Spirituality  

Hi [Colleague/Assistant Name],

Mary Thompson (HR, Summit Enterprises) has asked for guidance on fostering workplace spirituality. Before I compose a thoughtful reply for her, could you please:

1. Open our Notion workspace and locate any pages or notes related to:
   • Workplace spirituality or faith-based initiatives  
   • Integrating values and organizational culture  
   • Past workshops, sermons, or case studies on spirituality in the workplace  

2. Share those links or export them (PDF/Markdown is fine) so I can review the material today.

If there are calendar events or past emails that touch on this topic, kindly flag those as well.

Thank you for your help—this will ensure Mary receives the most relevant and well-rounded advice.

Blessings,  
Rev. John Harrison
